评论概述: only 10% cotton - listing has wrong description
评论详情: The listing has wrong information. It notes the fabric as "Fabric type Cotton, Polyester, Spandex"  The tag on the shirt notes 85% polyester, 10% cotton, 5% elastane.
This was a slam dunk!!!
I got the white and black one. I like the style of shirt. It gets wrinkled easily. I recommend wearing it under a pretty vest.

评论概述: Great for pirate or vampire costumes
评论详情: Very lightweight shirt that fits well. The chest opening has easy to use clasps to allow as much or as little chest exposure as you are comfortable with. It worked perfectly for my Halloween pirate outfit.
Might size up one size if you’re on the edge. Mine is A perfect fit but I’d like it looser. I ordered a large. Nice fabric
Looked and fit great. Definitely will wear again
It was very well made and true to size.
A good shirt.

评论概述: For what you get, it’s not half bad!
评论详情: Bought this for a fun little genderbent version of Glinda for the Wicked movie premier. Went with a bunch of friends who were also dressing up and I got so many compliments! The shirt it self was pretty decent, even if the stitching wasn’t always the best over the entire garment. But it fit great, looked more expensive than it was, and it had a real flowy feel and was nice and comfortable when I layered it under the jacket. I’d say you can’t go wrong if you have your eye on this, just understand it might not match up to your expansions with closer inspection.

评论概述: Great Costume Shirt for the Price
评论详情: The shirt worked well for my costume and was comfortable and wrinkle resistant after I ironed it the first time. There were a few small sewing imperfections but you can't beat the price. My main complaint was that the sleeves were short for the size that fit my chest. I am athletic build and most off the rack suits fit me, so keep that in mind.
This worked wonderful for my son’s costume. Made very nice.

评论概述: Two shirts ordered, One was fantastic!
评论详情: I ordered two shirts in large.  I'm 6' 2" and weigh 185# with a 42 in chest and a 32in waist.  One shirt was the correct shirt and is great! Fits perfectly and is of very nice quality.  The other shirt shipped was not even made by the same company and was completely made out of see through lace and could have been a womans blouse.  I'm returning the wrong item and have ordered another of the one I wanted as it is so nice.  Hopefully the shirt shipped this time will be correct.  Not the sellers fault as it was fulfilled by amazon.
I literally just opened notice it came in a returned plastic bag unfolded and wrinkled, so pissed off, I opened it and it is filthy, neck collar stains and a huge stain in the front.  Unacceptable!

This is made out of synthetic fabric, not cotton so just beware of that when you purchase. Also it's pretty thin so be prepared to wear an undershirt or something if you don't want to nip out at the Renaissance festival.
Sleeves were short.  Fabric was kinda thin, front ruffle small.  The sleeve ruffles were nice, except they didn't show because - short sleeves.  The loop for the top knot/button wasn't big enough.
Good quality fit great
Nice fabric steamed it prior to wearing Fit was as stated
Ordered and was way smaller. My mistake. But it was a nice shirt
Cannot rate for comfort. Purchased for Bridgerton themed event that was cancelled. However, the shirt looks great, the feel and sizing was good. Looks great.
Good fit nice product
I love this shirt. It was heavier than I expected, pleasantly so. It looks great on. My son skated in it to Phantom of the Opera and it moved perfectly with him. Lots of compliments.
Used as part of a costume. Good quality for price
Went very well with my masquerade outfit got so many compliments
Really nice high-quality I like it
Fit Well.  Top button is difficult
The cuffs need a bit of tightening but it's made well.
Very nice design and comfortable! For really nicely, I ordered my shirt size and it accompanied a costume of which won me a costume contest!
Bought for a Victorian gothic night. Got tons of compliments. Was worn with a jacket. Sizing was true to normal size.

评论概述: Overall good-except the sinching line on the cuff of the sleeve and the v neck
评论详情: The fabric was comfy, you feel very chic (or if you use it in a costume, like a gothic vampire or a carribean pirate). But right before the awesome frilly cuffs on the sleeves, there’s an elastic cinch about a 1/2-1 cm in size and it is very uncomfortable
This was perfect for our couples costumes of Nadja & Lazlo from ‘What We Do in the Shadows’! He got the wine color in XL. It was very silky and breathable ♥️

Seller takes returns and packages them unwashed and resells. Shirt had a brown stain on the inside and yellowed pit areas that I noticed when putting it on straight out of vacuum sealed package. Obviously did not check to see if the returned garment was clean or just simply did not care before repackaging and sending out. Beautiful and comfortable shirt, but gross that they didn’t take the care to make sure that the shirt was clean before sending out.
Pirate city!
So beautiful
Difficult to get creases out but perfect for birdgeton theme party
I love it everything about it and I will be getting the other colors
I like the concept of the shirt, but it needed more ruffles and the middle was tapered
Product was true to size. Slightly stretchy fabric fit well, I am using under a vest, works perfectly. Good value and quality for what I needed
Very detailed shirt... The material is light which is great for temps.

What I liked about this shirt was how well it fit my husband. It washes well and needs to be hung/lined dried, that’s no problem for me. It will need to be ironed after drying if you want a crisp look. Quality is nice, I think it will last a while, it’s for a costume. Price is reasonable. The material is lightweight polyester and has a little stretch to it. My husband went up a size to  (XL) for looser fit, says it’s comfortable and just what he was looking for!
I usually fit in a 2XL top, but this was a little smaller than I would want to wear.

评论概述: Great fit, perfect price point and does the job well.
评论详情: Bought a small size for a southern, gothic vampire look and it fits really well! I’m 6’1 roughly 165lbs for measurements. I do suggest a couple of things if you plan to purchase:  •Works really well with a vest •Highly recommend a bolo tie  The only thing I dislike but isn’t really a deal breaker for me is the top button is not really a button, more like a knot and on the other side has a little loop that can be tricky and annoying to slide through. Not impossible, just gotta finesse it a bit — Hence the bolo tie recommendation. You can find the one I have here on Amazon too. The wrists are nice detail as they have lace features and elastic that snug your wrist comfortably. The fabric itself isn’t a stretchy material but if you tuck it in and wear a vest, it’ll look great. Highly recommend!
Great look and fit
Good quality fabric and true to size!
fit was perfect.  good quality fabric.
The fabric is very light and comfortable. Because of the way it's packaged it's difficult to get the wrinkles out even after two washings. I would suggest dry cleaning press
Not bad quality for the price, I would recommend ordering a size up though. I’m 6 foot 194lbs and usually wear larges. I had to struggle to get it on and accidentally tore a cuff while taking it off.
Might need a safety pin or alterations for the top theres a small opening that could throw the top off but otherwise it’s a great buy

Bought this for my bf and we both think it is absolutely beautiful, gives him that gothic sexy sophisticated vibe, paired along with a vest too it looks amazing. Very comfy, decently stretchy, thin fabric but good quality. Very lightweight. I got him an extra large paired it with a large vest. He is 5 10 and about 220 lbs

评论概述: I'm a buck 30. I know . Bet I'm 5'11" . So buy  bigger. Great product  though.  Just be ready!
评论详情: Love it. As EXPECTED
Runs larger. No cotton in the materials. Not breathable. Could size down.
It definitely feels like a Halloween Costume fabric, very wrinkly. It looks like it needs to, but don't be fooled into thinking it's a nice quality shirt.
This shirt is more comfortable than most tops i own for daily wear. I highly recommend.
My boyfriend usually wears a medium, so I bought him a medium. He was SWIMMING in this shirt. Definitely size down. It will still be slightly oversized if you size down.
This shirt looks and feels great. It's a perfect match with my costume,
I had ordered a 3x. It's way to small.  I will be returning it.

My husband needed this shirt for a play. I checked the size chart, and it looked like a large would work well. It is a little smaller than expected but seems like it will work okay.  The cotton content is only 10%, so it should not shrink. It feels like polyester or something.

Bought this for my man and I was super impressed with the quality and looks of it! Fit him perfectly (we did size up) and the fabric is soooo soft and lightweight. Easy to iron , u couldn’t ask for a better shirt! And price was a steal!

I was looking for a festival shirt made of a cotton blend. This said it had cotton in it, but instead its 94% polyester and 4% spandex. There's no cotton in the entire blend. On top of that, the shirt was huge on me despite me following the size chart.

Just so you know it does get a but warm, which is good on my half cause it gets pretty cold where I live especially near halloween, other than that, no complaints, high quality, love the frills 10/10 recommend :33

评论概述: Material is thin enough to see nipples/areolar. Otherwise it is as advertised
评论详情: Ordered XXL and it fit fine. Form fitting but not too tight. However, material is sheer enough for nipples/areolar to show through. Should be fine if wearing a vest or coat? Color is more "off-white" or "light cream" rather than "White". Sleeves are long enough and overall construction seems to be well done. I think this would be a find shirt for cosplay, pirate, etc. See pic - note color difference with actual "White" gloves and how dark counter shows through fabric. - I would not get this again for myself but with all the above I WOULD recommend to others. (Price was easy on the pocketbook too)
Linda
It's nice and comfortable. My wife loves the way it looks on me. Not a thick material almost silky like. Not see through and has some strech to it
very thin, almost see-through but i expected that for 20 dollars
Awesome fits great looks good wearing wonderful 👍
The shirt fit perfectly! The material is a bit thin, but that can easily be fixed with a same color, undershirt. I am very happy with this, and would recommend. Thank you!
My bf wore this for Halloween and it was a great fit and good quality for a costume.
Great in the heat after washing with regular clothes the wrist lace started ripping but cheapest item definitely worth it for however

评论概述: Terrific shirt quality and size is perfect.
评论详情: I was nervous about the size because so many run small.  This one is true to fit and the fabric quality is terrific.
Was great for wearing at a fancy dress party.
My daughter was doing a portrayal of Jimi Hendrix for a school project and she picked this shirt. It was a hit!

This is a high quality, comfortable, and stretchy Ruffled shirt. It’s what the lady’s like. And that’s the truth, nothing but the truth. Only issue is the lack of varied color options and it’s incredibly thin. But otherwise it is perfect for what it’s for.

It'd be alright with some alterations. It's... kinda sheer despite getting the solid colour, and the neck opening doesn't stay closed. It only has a few little hooks, so unless you're going for a keyhole chest look then you might want to use a few safety pins. I also wish the ruffles were more... full? I don't expect a full on cravat, but there was absolutely no "fluff" or movement.
Fit me like a glove, a little loose as expected.
Makes you very handsome

评论概述: Nice for cosplay of any kindddd
评论详情: good fit, nice size has a nice amount of room and stretchy material.
this shirt is perfect for the occasion should have sized down, but is it work out
Husband wore on a Disney trip! Loved it. Exactly as pictured! Definitely recommend!
Bought this for my boyfriend to wear to a pirate themed event.  Very true to size, he wears a 2xl (6ft 3, 275lbs) and I ordered a 2xl which fit him perfectly.
Daughter got this shirt for homecoming. Fits hers good. She loved it.

I adore this shirt. Simple as that, honestly. I originally bought it for a cosplay about a year or so ago, since then it's become practically a staple in my closet. It isn't see-through unless you get it wet, and even then it's not the worst. I've never had it tear, and stains come out of it all right! The ruffles look super nice as well. The sleeves are slightly itchy though at the ends, which was super unbearable at first, but it was again because I was in a like, 3 or 4 layered cosplay in Texas heat. After that first time, it was nearly unnoticeable. The lace does end up tearing as well, but I don't think this shirt is supposed to be worn as often as I do, so that might be me? But overall, love it!!
Shirt worked out great with my costume.  I normally wear a large but this costume shirt in medium is the size of a large so I ordered medium.  Their sizing guide worked out perfectly.
It's not bad but not great. It's a bit short but the sleeves are OK. Nothing to write home about.
This was listed as a pirate shirt but we used it for a Romeo costume. It looked awesome & could be used for either
Will be perfect for costume for Dickens Fair
It was what I ordered
This was exactly what I was looking for but it ran a tad small so my husband wouldn't wear it.
Exactly like the picture. Perfect

If you are doing any sort of attire from older times, this shirt works well. I’ve worn it for Long George III, George Washington, a vampire, pirate, etc. The size and look are great and it is definitely worth it because of its versatility.

评论概述: Very impressive shirt for the price. Buy it!
评论详情: We bought this shirt for a pirate costume, and it exceeded our expectations. The fabric is a nice weight and has good movement, it washed and dried well, and any remaining wrinkles steamed out with ease. My husband found it comfortable to wear and received many compliments. It’s staying in our closet bc it could be styled for other costume looks.
Super nice and worked well for formal events and casual wear (victorian gothic aesthetic), although wear a shirt underneath if you don't want your chest/skin exposed
It's very light. It's sort of see through like a white dress shirt, I recommend wearing a white shirt under. You can wear a jacket over or just rock it as it is.

I loved everything about this shirt except the sleeves are a tad bit short, but I am a taller guy at 6 foot with longer arms. I have a 42 inch chest and I ordered the extra large and it fit perfectly.  I used a hot iron and all the packaging wrinkles came out immediately in this lightweight polyester blend material I will wear it again.
The size  ordered was a large and it didn't even go over my husband's head and he is a medium.
decent quality
I used this shirt for a cosplay and it fit perfectly, it was loose yet tight enough in the right places, well definitely buy again.

i originally bought this for my halloween costume, but i love it so much i might just wear it on the daily…. for some reason keeps me warm but not too hot, just the right temperature. looks nice, fit well, love it!!!!!!
